plot: This three part series follows a knife maker, beekeeper and baker as they pass on their passions to their young apprentices. Filmed in the Huon Valley of Tasmania, Australia.
plot_en: This three part series follows a knife maker, beekeeper and baker as they pass on their passions to their young apprentices. Filmed in the Huon Valley of Tasmania, Australia.
plot_es: This three part series follows a knife maker, beekeeper and baker as they pass on their passions to their young apprentices. Filmed in the Huon Valley of Tasmania, Australia.
title: The Passionate Apprentices
